meter_reading.notes: The odometer wheels clearly show 02271.0, which is 2271.0 m³. The red needle on the circular dial is positioned between the 0.03 and 0.04 marks. Visually, it is closer to 0.03 (approximately 0.033-0.034), so it is read as 0.03 m³. The total reading is 2271.0 + 0.03 = 2271.03 m³.
